channel.title: Data Cleaning on @rjmuwanga

item.title: From PDF to Data Frame in R
item.description: There are instances where you make a data request and you receive data in a PDF. Naturally, this presents a problem - how do you load it into R? As a simple example, I was interested in getting some data on Uganda’s education system. The data I was able to find was on Uganda’s USE and UPOLET ENLORMENT by Local Government / District that can be found here. As a bit of a background on the acronyms:
